  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El món de les ampliacions i les reduccions</string>
            <string language="en">The world of enlargements and reductions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Welt der Vergrößerungen und der 
Verkleinerungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le monde des agrandissements et des réductions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mundo das ampliações e das reduções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mondo degli ingrandimenti e delle riduzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κόσμος των διευρύνσεων και των μειώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) que treballa la proporcionalitat geomètrica de manera interactiva amb miniaplicacions i animacions tot fent ús d'elements de la vida quotidiana. Es tracta de reconèixer i analitzar la semblança  entre objectes que són ampliacions i reduccions d'un altre objecte. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) on geometric proportionality with mini-applications and animations using everyday objects to recognize and analyse the resemblance between objects that are enlargements or reductions of another object. It includes self-assessment activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques aplicades</string>
            <string language="en">applied mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas aplicadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vida quotidiana</string>
            <string language="en">everyday life</string>
            <string language="es">vida cotidiana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geometria</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">simulació</string>
            <string language="en">simulation</string>
            <string language="es">simulación</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
geometrischer Proportionatität mit Mini-Anwendungen und Animationen 
mit täglichen Nachrichten, die Ähnlichkeit zwischen Nachrichten zu 
erkennen und zu analysieren, die Vergrößerungen oder Verkleinerungen
einer anderen Nachricht sind. Sie schließt Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) sur la 
proportionnalité géométrique avec des mini-applications et des 
animations en utilisant les objets journaliers pour identifier et 
analyser la ressemblance entre les objets qui sont des agrandissements
ou des réductions d'un autre objet. Il inclut des activités de
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) no proportionality 
geométrico com mini-aplicações e animations usando objetos diários
reconhecer e analisar a semelhança entre os objetos que são 
ampliações ou reduções de um outro objeto. Inclui atividades
do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) sulla 
proporzionalità geometrica con le mini-applicazioni e le animazioni 
usando gli oggetti giornalieri per riconoscere ed analizzare la 
rassomiglianza fra gli oggetti che sono ingrandimenti o riduzioni di 
un altro oggetto. Include le attività di valutazione di se 
stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη γεωμετρική 
αναλογικότητα με τις μίνι-εφαρμογές και τις ζωτικότητες που 
χρησιμοποιούν τα καθημερινά αντικείμενα για να αναγνωρίσει και να 
αναλύσει την ομοιότητα μεταξύ των αντικειμένων που είναι 
διευρύνσεις ή μειώσεις ενός άλλου αντικειμένου. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">angewandte Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tägliche Lebensdauer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques appliquées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vie quotidienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matemática aplicada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vida diária</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matematica applicata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vita di tutti i giorni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφαρμοσμένα μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθημερινή ζωή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσομοίωση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
